AdjustableContainer.top.description: one of the borders the container can be attached to

AdjustableContainer.left.description: one of the borders the container can be attached to

AdjustableContainer.custom.description: a menu item in the right click menu. it contains user/package made custom items

AdjustableContainer.lock.description: locks your container. Which means it's not movable/resizable anymore and changes some other properties depending on the Lockstyle (like hiding the borders)

AdjustableContainer.full.description: one of the Lockstyles. Can also be translated as complete as it's locking the container without any margin left for the right click menu.

AdjustableContainer.load.description: loads the previously saved settings of the container

AdjustableContainer.disconnect.description: disconnect your container from the border frame
